name: Aztecs
civilization_bonus/2: +5 Monk hit points for each Monastery technology

name: Britons
civilization_bonus/0: Town Centers cost -50% wood upon reaching the Castle Age
civilization_bonus/1: Foot archers (excluding Skirmishers) have +1 range in Castle Age and +1 in Imperial Age (for +2 total)

name: Bizantines
civilization_bonus/0: Buildings (except gates) have +10% HP in Dark Age / +20% HP in Feudal Age  / +30% in Castle Age / +40% in Imperial Age
civilization_bonus/1: Spearman skirmisher and camel lines cost 25% less

name: Celts
civilization_bonus/3: Sheep cannot be stolen if within one Celt unit's line of sight

name: Chinese
civilization_bonus/0: Start game with 3 extra villagers but -50 wood and -200 food
civilization_bonus/1: Technologies cost -10% in Feudal Age/ -15% in Castle Age/-20% in Imperial Age
civilization_bonus/2: Town Centers support 10 population instead of 5

name: Franks
civilization_bonus/2: Farm upgrades are free (Mill is required to receive bonus)

name: Goths
civilization_bonus/0: Infantry cost 35% less (starting in Feudal Age)
civilization_bonus/2: Villagers have +5 attack versus wild boar
civilization_bonus/4: +10 to population limit in Imperial Age

name: Huns
civilization_bonus/0: Houses are not required to support population
civilization_bonus/2: Cavalry Archers cost -25% in Castle Age/ -30% in Imperial Age

name: Japanese
civilization_bonus/0: Fishing Ships have 2x HP and +2 pierce armor
civilization_bonus/1: Fishing Ships work +5% faster in Dark Age/ +10% in Feudal Age/ +15% in Castle Age/ +20% in Imperial Age
civilization_bonus/2: Lumber Camps / Mining Camps / Mills are 50% cheaper
civilization_bonus/3: Infantry attack 25% faster (starting in Feudal Age)

name: Koreans
civilization_bonus/2: Guard Tower and Keep upgrades are free
civilization_bonus/3: Towers (except bombard towers) have +1 range in Castle Age/ +2 in Imperial Age

name: Mayans
civilization_bonus/0: Start game with 1 extra villager but -50 food
civilization_bonus/2: Archers cost -10% in Feudal Age/ -20% in Castle Age/ -30% in Imperial Age

name: Mongols
team_bonus: Scout line has +2 Line of sight
civilization_bonus/1: Light Cavalry and Hussars have +30% HP

name: Persians
civilization_bonus/0: Start game with +50 wood and food
civilization_bonus/1: Town Center and Docks have 2x HP
civilization_bonus/2: Town Centers and Docks operate +10% faster in Feudal Age/ +15% in Castle Age/ +20% in Imperial Age

name: Saracens
team_bonus: Foot archers have +2 attack bonus against buildings
civilization_bonus/1: Transport Ships have 2x HP and carry capacity
civilization_bonus/3: Cavalry Archers have +4 attack bonus against buildings

name: Spanish
civilization_bonus/1: Blacksmith upgrades do not cost any gold
civilization_bonus/2: Cannon Galleons benefit from Ballistics (less reload time and more accuracy)
civilization_bonus/3: Hand Cannoneers and Bombard Cannons reload 15% faster

name: Teutons
team_bonus: Units are more resistant to conversion
civilization_bonus/4: Town Centers have +1 attack and +5 line of sight

name: Turks
civilization_bonus/4: Light Cavalry and Hussar upgrades are free

name: Vikings
civilization_bonus/1: Infantry have +10% HP in Feudal Age/ +15% in Castle Age/ +20% in Imperial Age
civilization_bonus/2: Wheelbarrow and Hand Cart are free
